name: Captured Feelings
description:
You are an emotionless shell that has no “Feelings” due to the lobotomy you have just been subjected to. The player has to traverse different areas in the asylum within their brain in search of jars of feelings. The player needs to avoid obstacles and various puzzles to gather feelings in search of their inner self. Upon releasing feelings from their jars, player’s environments will change.

 A game produced by Lunchbreak Entertainment.

Team Includes:

Anthony Tenerelli

Dan Cooper

Jon Mcconnell

Ben Holton

Gerrit Kremme
